it.uniroma1.di.simulejos.math

Class Matrix3

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniroma1.di.simulejos.math.Matrix3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Matrix3
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a 3x3 matrix. Objects of the Matrix3 class are immutable.
    Author:
    Alberto La Rocca
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static Matrix3 IDENTITY
      The 3x3 identity matrix.

      A null matrix filled with zeroes.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        public static final Matrix3 NULL
        A null matrix filled with zeroes.

      • IDENTITY

        public static final Matrix3 IDENTITY
        The 3x3 identity matrix.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Matrix3 create(double[] values)
        Creates a matrix based on the specified real values. Values must be specified row-first and must be 9. Modifications to the specified array will not affect the content of the newly created matrix.
        Parameters:
        values - An array of 9 real values representing the values to put in the new matrix, specified in row-first order.
        Returns:
        The newly created Matrix3 object.

      • createRotation

        public static Matrix3 createRotation(double x,
                     double y,
                     double z,
                     double a)
        Creates a rotation matrix based on the specified parameters. The x, y and z arguments describe a unit-length vector representing the rotation axis, while the a argument is the rotation angle, in radians.
        Parameters:
        x - The X component of a unit-length vector describing the rotation axis.
        y - The Y component of a unit-length vector describing the rotation axis.
        z - The Z component of a unit-length vector describing the rotation axis.
        a - The rotation angle, in radians.
        Returns:
        The newly created Matrix3 object.

      • createScaling

        public static Matrix3 createScaling(double x,
                    double y,
                    double z)
        Creates a scaling matrix, a matrix that transforms vectors multiplying each component by a factor.
        Parameters:
        x - The X factor.
        y - The Y factor.
        z - The Z factor.
        Returns:
        The newly created Matrix3 object.

      • clone

        public Matrix3 clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object

      • toArray

        public double[] toArray()
        Returns the real values contained in this matrix as an array and in row-first order. Modifications to the returned array will not affect this matrix.
        Returns:
        An array containing the real values of this matrix, in row-first order.

      • toHomogeneous

        public Matrix4 toHomogeneous()
        Converts this 3x3 matrix to a 4x4 matrix that can be used to transform homogeneous Vector4 objects. The returned matrix is identical to this matrix in the upper left 3x3 block, has a 1 in the lower right cell and is otherwise zeroed.
        Returns:
        A new Matrix4 object.

      • getAt

        public double getAt(int i,
           int j)
        Returns the value in this matrix at the specified cell coordinates. Both i and j must be within the range [0, 2], otherwise an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        i - The row index.
        j - The column index.
        Returns:
        The real value at the specified coordinates.

      • determinant

        public double determinant()
        Computes the determinant of this matrix.
        Returns:
        The determinant of this matrix.

      • by

        public Matrix3 by(double a)
        Multiplies each value of this matrix by a factor. A new matrix is returned, while this one is left unchanged.
        Parameters:
        a - The multiplication factor.
        Returns:
        A new Matrix3 object representing the multiplied matrix.

      • by

        public Vector3 by(Vector3 v)
        Multiplies this 3x3 matrix to the left by a 3x1 matrix specified by a Vector3 object. The resulting 3x1 matrix is returned as a new Vector3 object.
        Parameters:
        v - The 3x1 matrix to multiply to the right of this matrix.
        Returns:
        A new Vector3 object representing the 3x1 product matrix.

      • by

        public Matrix3 by(Matrix3 matrix)
        Multiplies this 3x3 matrix to the left of another 3x3 matrix. The resulting 3x3 product matrix is returned as a new Matrix3 object, while this one is left unchanged.
        Parameters:
        matrix - A 3x3 matrix to multiply to the right of this one.
        Returns:
        A new Matrix3 object representing the 3x3 product matrix.

      • transpose

        public Matrix3 transpose()
        Computes the transpose of this matrix. The computed matrix is returned as a new Matrix3 object, while this one is left unchanged.
        Returns:
        A new Matrix3 object representing the transpose of this matrix.

      • invert

        public Matrix3 invert()
        Computes the inverse of this matrix. The computed matrix is returned as a new Matrix3 object, while this one is left unchanged.
        Returns:
        A new Matrix3 object representing the transpose of this matrix.
